Changelog:
Synthara puts reliability first in it's latest update! With version 2.2, we squashed more bugs than all our previous 2.x updates!

We also included several new commands:

• Tutorial

• Support

• Purge

These commands and this new update collectively helps us prioritize your experience before all else!

We pushed another hotfix (2.1-Hotfix-2) to include urgent changes related to our file system calls. This is in an attempt to fix possible data rewrites that were happening on versions 2.1-Hotfix-1 and earlier.

Thank you for your patience, feedback, and support!

Synthara builds off of version 2.0 by introducing version 2.1, which includes changes to:

• Web Pages

• Subsystem-X

• Setting Customization

• General Reliability

And much more!

Please visit https://synthara.xyz to add Synthara 2.1 now!
Synthara version 2.0 publically releases Synthara for all to use! Learn more at https://synthara.xyz/new

We pushed a hotfix to Synthara 1.4 to fix a few bugs that were introduced during the update.

We have fixed:

• Suggested Songs 'Running Out'
• Skipping In Crossfade Not Working
• Seeking On The Lyric Portal Not Working
• Descriptions on embeds not being correct

And More!

Synthara 1.4 is our biggest update yet and features a complete overhaul of many features.

This version won't have a traditional changelog as it isn't a regular update. So many features have been changed, making a changelog uneccesary for this update. Every part of Synthara has been changed in some way!

We hope you enjoy Synthara 1.4, as well as the hundreds of bug fixes that came with it! Check back here for the changelog on 1.5 when we're ready.

A new redesign with a sidebar and dynamic content.
Service changes now live here too!
